$jsonSchema.title: Represents a planet in the galactic war that must receive Managed democracy

_id.description: The index of this planet, for convenience kept the same as in the official API

name.description: The human readable name of the planet, or unknown if it's not a known name

disabled.description: Whether or not this planet is currently playable (enabled)

initial_owner.description: Which faction originally claimed this planet

max_health.description: maximum health of this planet, used in conflict states

position.description: The coordinates in the galaxy where this planet is located

sector.description: The name of the sector this planet resides in (or the identifier as a string if it's not a known sector)

waypoints.description: Waypoints, seems to link planets together but purpose unclear
